languages.text: "У тебя две проблемы — слишком мало еды в котле и слишком много голодающих возле него. Что бы ты мог сделать?"
"Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"
languages.original_text: "У тебя две проблемы — слишком мало еды в котле и слишком много голодающих возле него. Что бы ты мог сделать?"

traits.locale_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

languages.text: "Sehen wir uns diese beiden Probleme an: nicht genug zu essen auf dem Teller und zu viele hungrige Mäuler. Was könntet Ihr tun?"
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Sehen wir uns diese beiden Probleme an: nicht genug zu essen auf dem Teller und zu viele hungrige Mäuler. Was könntet Ihr tun?"

languages.text: « Je vois deux problèmes majeurs : il n'y a pas assez de nourriture dans la cuve et trop d'affamés tournant autour. Que pourriez-vous faire pour y remédier ? »
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vois deux problèmes majeurs : il n'y a pas assez de nourriture dans la cuve et trop d'affamés tournant autour. Que pourriez-vous faire pour y remédier ? »

languages.text: «Pensemos en estos dos problemas: no hay bastante comida en la cuba y hay mucha gente que se muere de hambre. ¿Cómo podemos resolver los dos?».
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

traits.locale_text: «Pensemos en estos dos problemas: no hay bastante comida en la cuba y hay mucha gente que se muere de hambre. ¿Cómo podemos resolver los dos?».

languages.text: 「この二つの問題について考えましょう。鍋に十分な食料がないこと、そして鍋の周りに飢えた人間が多すぎること。お前に何ができる？」
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

traits.locale_text: 「この二つの問題について考えましょう。鍋に十分な食料がないこと、そして鍋の周りに飢えた人間が多すぎること。お前に何ができる？」

languages.text: “举个例子，你现在面临两个问题：一是大缸里的东西不够吃，二是饿肚子的人太多。这种时候，你该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"

traits.locale_text: “举个例子，你现在面临两个问题：一是大缸里的东西不够吃，二是饿肚子的人太多。这种时候，你该怎么办？”

languages.text: "Elimizdeki şu iki sorunu bir düşünelim. Tankta yeteri kadar yiyecek yok ve etrafında çok fazla aç insan var. Sen ne yapardın?"
languages.original_text: "Let's consider these two problems: not enough food in the vat and too many starving people around it. What could you do?"
